programme.desc: Downsizing can be a difficult transition & Jin's objective is to make it as seamless as possible. In this episode, Jin is getting outdoors by practicing archery with Mike but mostly just to compete for bragging rights. Jin's client is moving from a house in Port Credit to a luxurious condo close to the downtown core. They desire extra bedrooms for when their children are visiting, all the amenities, & waterfront views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto & Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, & want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space & want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, & breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: An amazing beachfront property is what Inez's couple is looking for & these top million dollar agents are sure to surpass their expectations. Inez's client currently lives in a condo & have one child, however, they desire a home that they can comfortably expand their family in.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's friend invites him to an Indian wedding & tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. Daryl, Inez, & Jin support & donate to Mike's charity after winning a bet amongst them & the amount is determined by how long Mike lasts in the ring boxing against a professional. This client is looking for an investment property & a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Somewhere to spend the rest of their days surrounded by nature sounds like a paradise to retire in. Daryl & Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found & Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryl's client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land & nature. It is very important to them because they want to be able to have everyone comfortably visit & eventually retire here in a few years.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inez's couple is not too picky & open to different kinds of properties. Daryl & Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client & the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mike's client is looking for a waterfront cottage with lots of land & privacy. What better way to check out some waterfront listings then from a helicopter? Debbie wants a family cottage that feels homey, however, Paul wants an impressive high-end cottage that he can bring his business clients to.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Remarrying is hard enough let alone combining two families under one roof. With a total of 4 children between the ages of 7 & 16 Jin's client is definitely going to need lots of space & land in a safe neighborhood. Daryl, Inez, & Mike attend Jin's band practice to support her & listen to the set list they have prepared for an upcoming charity event. Jin gets her nails done frequently & this time Daryl decides to join her for some much needed pampering.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Now that Kristen & Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver & want somewhere of their own to stay in. Daryl & the other top million dollar agents have a wide range to search over because Daryl's client is willing to live an hour or two drive away from downtown Toronto. Daryl, Jin, & Mike meet up for lunch in Port Dover to discuss business & later in the episode Mike & Daryl get their hands dirty in the kitchen at Sababa Restaurant.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Deborah & Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission & throw a yacht party for the client's decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal & discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: When Dana and Eric aren't busy with their successful family business, they have their hands full with their 4 children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jonathan and Kerry are in the market for a new home to share memories in with their family; with a budget of 12 million dollars, Real Estate Agent Tav Schembri is challenged to find the family their dream home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Nathan, a start up company owner and his fiance Kelsey, a owner of a holistic nutrition company, are open to purchasing a house anywhere in the GTA.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Katerina and Mauricio are looking for one property in Canada and a holiday home in Belize, specifically on a private island.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Fernando and his investment group are looking to either buy or build a resort in Canada or Mexico with the help of Joe Petrella Construction.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Real Estate Agents Jasmine Xuereb & Laura Compagni team up to aid power couple Jamie and Jennifer in purchasing either a real estate investment in Canada or Belize.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The brokers explore Central America to find real estate options that fit the bill for two buyers looking for a change of scene.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike team up once again with local agent to find a unique opportunities for residential investments.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Marshall and Maria can't decide whether they should buy a property in Canada (Marshall's homeland) or Cuba (Maria's homeland).

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Alan & Amber are ready to buy the property of their dreams, and broker Jasmine Xuereb is ready to help!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Rick looks for properties in Canada and abroad; Tav Schembri suggests Caledon; Mike Donia recommends Panama.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike Donia locates an ultra-luxurious, private paradise for two buyers on Pearl Island, Panama, boasting 30 km of coastline and a rich marine sanctuary.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tav and Mike team up once again to find unique opportunities in Canada as well villas in Los Cabos, Mexico.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura Compagni teams up with Mataj Architects and The Parentela Family to introduce the first of the Hotel Vie chain of luxury hotels.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Downsizing can be a difficult transition & Jin's objective is to make it as seamless as possible. In this episode, Jin is getting outdoors by practicing archery with Mike but mostly just to compete for bragging rights. Jin's client is moving from a house in Port Credit to a luxurious condo close to the downtown core. They desire extra bedrooms for when their children are visiting, all the amenities, & waterfront views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto & Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, & want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space & want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, & breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: An amazing beachfront property is what Inez's couple is looking for & these top million dollar agents are sure to surpass their expectations. Inez's client currently lives in a condo & have one child, however, they desire a home that they can comfortably expand their family in.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's friend invites him to an Indian wedding & tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. Daryl, Inez, & Jin support & donate to Mike's charity after winning a bet amongst them & the amount is determined by how long Mike lasts in the ring boxing against a professional. This client is looking for an investment property & a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Somewhere to spend the rest of their days surrounded by nature sounds like a paradise to retire in. Daryl & Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found & Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryl's client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land & nature. It is very important to them because they want to be able to have everyone comfortably visit & eventually retire here in a few years.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inez's couple is not too picky & open to different kinds of properties. Daryl & Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client & the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E20 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.desc: A look back at the opening tracks from all the 80s NOW albums - from Phil Collins on NOW 1 to Tears For Fears on NOW 16. Plus those TV adverts that made them famous!

programme.title: Best Played at 45 RPM!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Best Played at 45 RPM!
programme.desc: Before the CD, the perfect pop songs were spun by singers & bands on 7 inch vinyl. From 1980-1984 these were the classic UK hits that invaded the world!

programme.title: Clare Grogan's Tartan Top 30
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Clare Grogan's Tartan Top 30
programme.desc: In the 80s the Scottish scene was vibrant & creative with punk, indie, synth, acoustic & Celtic folk influences topping the charts. Altered Images' Clare Grogan has 30 of the best.

programme.title: Best Played at 45 RPM!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Best Played at 45 RPM!
programme.desc: Before the CD, the perfect pop songs were spun by singers & bands on 7 inch vinyl. From 1980-1984 these were the classic UK hits that invaded the world!

programme.title: Christmas Stars - Then & Now!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Christmas Stars - Then & Now!
programme.desc: Where are they now? Classic 80s hits, followed by some recent songs & Xmas anthems - Including Pet Shop Boys, Elton, Kylie, Abba, The Pretenders, The Beatles, Rick Astley & Bros.

programme.title: Timmy Mallett's Brilliant Bands!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Timmy Mallett's Brilliant Bands!
programme.desc: Timmy's back with something a little different - a run through of his favourite 80s bands, many interviewed on his "Timmy On The Tranny" radio show throughout the decade!

programme.title: Seven Inch Heroes!
programme.desc: Before the CD, the perfect pop songs were spun by singers & bands on 7 inch vinyl. From 1980-1984 these were the classic UK hits that invaded the world!

programme.title: 80 Brits & Their Lesser-Known Hits
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 80 Brits & Their Lesser-Known Hits
programme.desc: They were well known at the time, but these hits have faded into obscurity - until now! From Adam Ant to Yazoo via Bucks Fizz & Swing Out Sister.

programme.title: Every No.1 of the 70s!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Every No.1 of the 70s!
programme.desc: Our most complete list yet of UK number 1s of the decade! Some songs just don't have videos, but 146 chart toppers do, and here they are - in order!

programme.title: The 5 O'Clock Groovy Zone!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The 5 O'Clock Groovy Zone!
programme.desc: Over-bearded men & leftfield ladies - all with fabulous tunes! These are alternative hits from the west coast, the underground & the counter culture of the 1970s.

programme.title: Top of the 70s Charts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Top of the 70s Charts
programme.desc: 3 hours of bona fide classics from the best decade of music - every one of them made UK number 1. With rock, disco, soul, pop & more!

programme.title: Pat Sharp's Forgotten No.1s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Pat Sharp's Forgotten No.1s
programme.desc: Pat Man selects 30 chart toppers of the 70s that have probably slipped your mind! Expect lesser remembered hits from Mud, Dr Hook, David Cassidy, Lena Martell & Brotherhood of Man.

programme.title: All Day - They Hit The Top Spot!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 All Day - They Hit The Top Spot!
programme.desc: All day - a choice selection of the 168 singles that reached the top of the UK charts in the 1970s!

programme.title: Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1970
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1970
programme.desc: 60 minutes of back to back 1970 number 1s - from Simon & Garfunkel and Elvis Presley to Lee Marvin & Freda Payne. With Mr Charts himself - Mark Goodier.

programme.title: Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1974
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1974
programme.desc: 60 minutes of back to back number 1s from 1974 - from the end of The Osmonds to the start of Abba! With Mr Charts himself - Mark Goodier.

programme.title: It Spent HOW Long At No.1 ?!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 It Spent HOW Long At No.1 ?!
programme.desc: Once these tracks made it to the top spot there was no knocking them off! This is our countdown of the 50 longest chart toppers of the 1970s!

programme.title: Feelgood Friday!
programme.desc: Feelgood hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots & flares at the ready?

programme.title: Pat Sharp's 40 Guilty Pleasures!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Pat Sharp's 40 Guilty Pleasures!
programme.desc: Songs you really like but are a bit too embarrassed to admit. Don't worry, we're all in the same boat here & Pat urges you to try to have a little less shame in your musical game!

programme.title: Feelgood Friday!
programme.desc: Feelgood hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots & flares at the ready?

programme.title: Festive Faves! 70s v 60s v 50s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Festive Faves! 70s v 60s v 50s
programme.desc: 3 decades of classic festive faves from Bing Crosby & Perry Como to Boney M & Paul McCartney.

programme.title: Bubblegum Pop! Top 30
programme.desc: Today we'd call it Cheesy Pop! Back then it was Bubblegum Pop, and we loved it through the 70s - with David Cassidy, Mungo Jerry, Tony Orlando, Donny Osmond & Brotherhood of Man.

programme.title: Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1974
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1974
programme.desc: 60 minutes of back to back number 1s from 1974 - from the end of The Osmonds to the start of Abba! With Mr Charts himself - Mark Goodier.

programme.title: It Spent HOW Long At No.1 ?!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 It Spent HOW Long At No.1 ?!
programme.desc: Once these tracks made it to the top spot there was no knocking them off! This is our countdown of the 50 longest chart toppers of the 1970s!

programme.title: Feelgood Friday!
programme.desc: Feelgood hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots & flares at the ready?

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1976
programme.desc: The hottest songs from the year of a record breaking summer! Simon Bates has the soundtrack of a great 12 months in pop, including Wings, Wild Cherry & The Wurzels!

programme.title: 1976 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1976!

programme.title: GBH! Great Brit Hits of the 70s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 GBH! Great Brit Hits of the 70s
programme.desc: 25 classic hits from the Brits - songs that have stood the test of time. Including 10cc, Bryan Ferry, Queen & Kate Bush!

programme.title: Bruno Brookes-Never Even A Top 10?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bruno Brookes-Never Even A Top 10?
programme.desc: Bruno Brookes guides you through the stats in disbelief! Three hours of top tunes from superstars like Bowie, Abba, Bob Marley, Queen, The Who and more. But why didn't we buy 'em?!

programme.title: Magic Moments! The 70s
programme.desc: Experience the magic of the 70s, where every beat was a spell and every song a timeless enchantment!

programme.title: Surely Not A Cover? Top 30
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Surely Not A Cover? Top 30
programme.desc: Some will really surprise you! 30 classic 70s hits that were all covers including Rod Stewart, John Lennon, Shirley Bassey & The Wurzels!

programme.title: Saturday Night's Alright!
programme.desc: From the era of Glam Rock, New Wave & Disco - it's all the party hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots & flares at the ready?

programme.title: Clare Grogan's Teenage Kicks!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Clare Grogan's Teenage Kicks!
programme.desc: The 5 years from '77 to '81 was possibly the most exciting & vibrant time to be a teenager & Clare Grogan was there - buying the records, seeing the bands & wearing the t-shirts!

programme.title: Saturday Night's Alright!
programme.desc: From the era of Glam Rock, New Wave & Disco - it's all the party hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots & flares at the ready?

programme.title: Rod Stewart: 1971-1979
programme.desc: With 14 top 10 hits, Rod was beaten only by Elvis & Abba in the 70s. Here are 10 great videos, in order, from Maggie May onwards including a couple you may have forgotten!

programme.title: Rocket Man! Elton in the 70s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Rocket Man! Elton in the 70s
programme.desc: His national treasure status has grown with time, and every one of these songs is now considered a classic. These are Elton's big hits in order from 1971's "Your Song" onwards.

programme.title: Limahl's Never Ending Soundtracks!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Limahl's Never Ending Soundtracks!
programme.desc: 2 decades of movie moments and classic pop hits from the 70s & 80s. Direct from the red carpet - Limahl is ready for his close-up!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1976
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of heatwave hits & headlines from a year of contrasts - Punk, Dancing Queen, the Inter-City 125, the Honey Monster & that year's top toy - Swingball!

programme.title: Earth Wind & Fire v Sunshine Band!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth Wind & Fire v Sunshine Band!
programme.desc: 30 minutes of funk & disco from 2 of the biggest feelgood bands of the decade!

programme.title: Disco Bling!
programme.desc: Get on the Love train with some top tunes to satisfy those Boogie Nights!

programme.title: ABBA! Disco Gold
programme.desc: Every glittering music video from ABBAâs disco era, packed with iconic hits and timeless dance-floor magic. Sequins, rhythm, and pure â70s nostalgia! And Dancing Queen.

programme.title: Simon Bates: Disco Inferno!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates: Disco Inferno!
programme.desc: From the early days when soul gained that disco beat in 1973, to the turn of the decade when Blondie & Diana Ross got in on the act! Simon Bates is your dancefloor host!

programme.title: 70s Love Songs
programme.desc: Non-stop love songs, back to back, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, The Bee Gees & Minnie Ripperton.

programme.title: NOW 100 Hits: Love Songs!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 NOW 100 Hits: Love Songs!
programme.desc: Simon Bates with the ultimate countdown of 70s love songs. 100 songs with heartfelt vocals, lush strings & big breakdowns in an 8 hour marathon! Expect Chicago, Eric Carmen & 10cc.

programme.title: 70s Love Songs
programme.desc: Non-stop love songs, back to back, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, The Bee Gees & Minnie Ripperton.

programme.title: Torn Between Two Lovers! Top 25
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Torn Between Two Lovers! Top 25
programme.desc: 25 beautiful breakup, sad & bitter-sweet love songs. With Gilbert O'Sullivan, Cliff Richard, Mary MacGregor, Leo Sayer & Elton John.

programme.title: Hamilton's Hotshots! Top 30
programme.desc: In the mid-70s Diddy David Hamilton was on Radio 1 AND Radio 2 at the same time! And these are a choice selection of his records of the week - his "Hamilton's Hotshots"!

programme.title: The Edible Road Show
programme.desc: Carlo takes us through Vancouver's world famous chinatown. We visit two very different markets for exotic veggies and spices and sample Cambodian noodle soup, Japanese sushi, Chinese dim sum and Vietnamese sandwiches.

programme.title: The Edible Road Show
programme.desc: Carlo and Natalie Richard explore the romance and gastronomy of Quebec City. Join them as they walk the cobble stone streets and sample the yummy offerings from Le café Du Monde, Le Marie-Clarisse, Le St. Amour and Graffiti.

programme.title: The Edible Road Show
programme.desc: Carlo takes us on a heli-hiking adventure in the Bugaboo Mountains as we experience an all-Canadian bar-b-cue at 7000 feet featuring venison bratwurst and bison burgers! We also follow the executive chef at the prestigious Royal York hotel as he prepares dinner for The Queen of England, and in Northern Quebec we meet a couple who harvest wild indigenous Canadian delicacies from a converted sugar shack.

programme.title: Global Street Eats
programme.desc: Chef Dev shows off Caribbean street foods he grew up eating. including Pepper Shrimp from Jamaica. Saltfish and Bake from Guyana. and Doubles from Trinidad and Tobago.

programme.title: Global Street Eats
programme.desc: Chef Dev loves spicy food. so he’s making some of his favorite street food recipes that use chilis. including Hawawshi sandwiches from Egypt. Chicken 65 from India. and Street Corn from Mexico.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Vanessa Gianfrancesco, Italian chef extraordinaire, shows us how to prepare bread in delicious ways before cooking the perfect juicy steak, with a side of Tuscan beans, and finishing it all with a light tiramisu.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Noodles are the star ingredients when chef Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen cooks up somen noodles with dipping sauce, ramen salad, a fried noodle dish, and a one-pot delight.

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Korea, Russia, Spain, El Salvador
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by South Korea - Jicama Kimchi, Russia - Roasted Eggplant Salad, Spain - Quinoa Paella, and El Salvador - Salvadorian Grilled Iceberg Lettuce Wedge!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Indonesia, Greece, Syria, Thailand
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by Indonesia - Tomato Nasi Goreng, Greece - Greek Melon Salad, Syria - Kidney Bean Hummus, and Thailand - Coconut Curry Cabbage Rolls!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Sweden, Mexico, Senegal, Italy
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by Sweden - Swedish Turnips and Granola, Mexico - Radicchio Tacos, Senegal - Cashew-Sweeth Potato Maafe, and Italy - Bok Choy Fusili!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 South Africa, Iceland, Bangladesh, Spain
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by South Africa - Braaied Rapini, Iceland - Cold Icelandic Pepper Soup, Bangladesh - Edamame Jhalmuri, and Spain - Spanish Broccoli Tortilla!

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: In this "R" challenge, Chef Lauren Gulyas shows us how to use rice and rosemary in delicious meals.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: After picking the letter "L," Chef Robert Jewell takes on lamb and licorice in this ingredient challenge. He starts with aromatic Moroccan lamb riblets, an appetizer that will make you want this spicy dish as your main course too. Next, Robert takes it up a notch by showing us how to make licorice - yes, the candy! He brings coconut oil, brown sugar, creamed coconut, and molasses to boil before skillfully adding flour and anise to make sweet, chewy coconut licorice. Finally, Robert concocts the perfect recipe that combines succulent lamb with sweet licorice.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Host Theresa Visintin creates savoury meals in this letter "R" challenge featuring radicchios and raisins. First, Theresa chops up bold and bitter radicchios, grilling them until the edges are a crispy golden brown and perfect for a warm wedge salad. Then, she tosses fried pancetta and earthy portobello mushrooms in a luxurious champagne vinegar and pours it over the crispy radicchio. Theresa tops this warm salad with creamy crumbled goat's cheese. For her next dish, Theresa prepares a rum raisin sauce using golden sultana raisins, dark rum, and fresh orange. Theresa pours the sauce over succulent ham. Is your mouth watering yet? Finally, Theresa combines radicchio and raisin into a...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: It's all about pork and peanuts, today's challenge is the letter "P." Chef Lauren Gulyas serves up an old school favourite, smothered pork chops. Using a blend of savoury ingredients, and with the help of her cast iron pan, Chef Lauren provides us with tips on how to keep your pork tender and tasty. Next, it's time for a West African peanut soup. Drizzling garlic, ginger and onions with extra virgin olive oil and letting them sizzle in a frying pan until the onions are soft brings out a sweetness that lends itself beautifully to the salty, earthy taste of peanuts. To finish, Chef Lauren puts an Asian twist on a southern classic, when she combines the two ingredients.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Meet Iafa Almeida Cac
programme.desc: Host Tyrone Edwards reveals to Brazil-born Iafa Almeida Cac that she has roots from other places. Alongside an expert chef, Iafa cooks a recipe that blends fresh ingredients from her Brazilian and newfound culture.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Host Tyrone Edwards takes PJ Kerr on a journey to discover his ancestry and meets with an expert chef to learn more about his newfound roots.

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 India, Belgium, Italy, China
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by India - Bhindi Masala-Style Nopales, Belgium - Belgian Plantain Waffles, Italy - Almond Crusted Portobellos, and China - Sichuan Artichoke Stir Fry!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 USA, Vietnam, Spain, India
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by the USA - Scalloped Cassava Casserole, Vietnam - Pear Summer Rolls, Spain - Hempseed Romesco with Leeks, and India - Potato Biryani Hash!

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Endearing host Tyrone Edwards surprises South African-born Shameen Miller with the results of her DNA test. Shameen cooks a meal that combines her two cultures and shares it with her family.

programme.title: Gusto's QR Countdown
programme.desc: Unlock Gusto TV's top recipes on QR Countdown! Thousands of viewers scan our QR codes to access our delicious dishes. Now. we're serving up this month’s 8 most popular recipes!

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Mary Bosco is Italian, but Host Tyrone Edwards surprises her by revealing that her DNA test includes roots from other places. Mary cooks a special meal for her family that combines her two cultures.

programme.title: Global Street Eats
programme.desc: Chef Dev shows off Caribbean street foods he grew up eating. including Pepper Shrimp from Jamaica. Saltfish and Bake from Guyana. and Doubles from Trinidad and Tobago.

programme.title: Global Street Eats
programme.desc: Chef Dev loves spicy food. so he’s making some of his favorite street food recipes that use chilis. including Hawawshi sandwiches from Egypt. Chicken 65 from India. and Street Corn from Mexico.

programme.title: MORE One Big Recipe
programme.desc: Re-join Chef Kimberly Lallouz in her One Big Recipe test kitchen as she masterfully creates a week night feast of braised oxtail and plantain waffles, Turkish eggs with spiced yogurt, grilled broccolini, and plum parfait with gluten-free granola.

programme.title: MORE One Big Recipe
programme.desc: Re-join Chef Kimberly Lallouz in her One Big Recipe test kitchen as she masterfully creates a week night feast of Swiss chard and pea salad with green apple vinaigrette, broccoli and cheddar soup, salt crusted lamb loin with lamb gravy, and a green apple panna cotta with crispy cheddar frico.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.desc: Chef Spencer Watts prepares quick, easy, and delicious dishes like Skillet Lasagna, Creamed Spinach, and Banana Ice Cream in under 30 minutes.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.desc: 30-minute meals have never tasted this good! Chef Spencer Watts offers up some secrets for the perfect fish and chips dinner.

programme.title: One BIG Recipe
programme.desc: What sets this cool One Big Recipe by charismatic chef-host Kimberly Lallouz apart? Folks, may I introduce the 'Wow Factor'? It's that hard- to-define special something, but we know it when we see it! Ogle her Chilled Mussels over Grilled Baguette lightly drizzled with vibrant, golden Saffron Aioli. Gasp at the golden gorgeous Roasted Mini Butternuts, ever so very vivacious with their Salsa Verde, tart Goat Cheese, and nutty toasted sunflower seed garnishes. Bone-in Veal Roast with an easy-to-execute and guaranteed-to-wow presentation is the apex of the event, with grainy mustard vinaigrette-dressed Charred Bok Choy halves. Dessert gets a moment in the spotlight, summer berries draped...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Thai chef Pailin Chongchitnant shows us the secrets behind Bangkok's famous street food with pork skewers, noodle soup, five-spice pork belly soup, and pandan coconut custard fondue.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Cheese: an Argentinian Favourite
programme.desc: Award-winning Argentinian chef Natalia Machado perfects a line-up of dishes featuring cheese, from grilled provolone with salad to ricotta gnocci to grilled steak-pizza and a zesty cheesecake.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Italy's love affair with the tomato
programme.desc: The humble tomato - called the pomodoro, or 'apple of gold' in Italy - is the star of this episode as Chef Vanessa Gianfrancesco creates a rustic appetizer, two iconic mains, and even a dessert using tomatoes!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Yoshoku: Japanese recipes inspired by Western cuisine
programme.desc: Chef and cookbook author Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen makes Japanese Yoshoku dishes - recipes that are inspired by western cuisine, from spaghetti to croquettes to hamburgers and a creamy seafood bake.

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 France, Japan, Morocco, Mexico
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by France - French Fennel Soup, Japan - Unagi-Style Soy Glazed Figs, Morocco - Moroccan Butterbean Tagine, and Mexico - Asparagus Ceviche!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Thailand, France, Sweden, Italy
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by Thailand - Carrot Pad Thai, France - Ground Cherry Salad, Sweden - Swedish Pecan Balls, and Italy - Corn Farroto!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Vietnam, Lebanon, China, Germany
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by Vietnam - Vietnamese Green Beans, Lebanon - Watermelon Tabbouleh, China - Signapore-Style Spaghetti Squash Noodles, and Germany - Celeriac Sauerbraten and Slaw!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Italy, Morocco, Ethiopia, Jamaica
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by Italy - Roasted Radishes and Radish Pesto, Morocco - Moroccan Spiced Apples, Ethiopia - Ethiopian Spinach Dip, and Jamaica - Jerk Shiitakes with Coconut Rice!

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Garbanzo Beans and Grapefruit
programme.desc: In this fast-paced episode, host Theresa Visintin uses two unlikely ingredients that start with the letter "G," garbanzo beans and grapefruit! First up, Theresa cooks socca, a savoury garbanzo bean pancake recipe, and infuses it with Mediterranean flavours. To make her batter, Theresa combines chickpea flour with salty olives, sweet red pepper, and fresh basil. Once the batter is ready to go, she fries the savoury crepe. Next up, Theresa balances tart grapefruit with a sweet buttery lobster tail. But that's not sweet enough for Theresa! She prepares sabayon, a delicate honey custard that melts in your mouth. Finally, Theresa shows us how to make a mouth-watering dish by combining...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Chicken and corn are the key players in this letter “C” challenge. Chef Lauren Gulyas prepares one of her favourite Italian dishes, chicken Marsala. Using garlic, shallots, and white wine, Chef Lauren whips up a rich Marsala sauce that is nutty and floral in flavour. Next, she transforms corn into a creamy polenta topping for her Shepard’s pie...with a twist! Sautéing onion, garlic, and lean ground beef, she uses Worcestershire sauce and tomato paste to give the pie filling an extra flavour boost. Once she finishes those dishes, Chef Lauren creates a mouth-watering recipe that combines both chicken and corn.

programme.title: MORE One Big Recipe
programme.desc: Re-join Chef Kimberly Lallouz in her One Big Recipe test kitchen as she masterfully creates a week night feast of braised oxtail and plantain waffles, Turkish eggs with spiced yogurt, grilled broccolini, and plum parfait with gluten-free granola.

programme.title: MORE One Big Recipe
programme.desc: Re-join Chef Kimberly Lallouz in her One Big Recipe test kitchen as she masterfully creates a week night feast of Swiss chard and pea salad with green apple vinaigrette, broccoli and cheddar soup, salt crusted lamb loin with lamb gravy, and a green apple panna cotta with crispy cheddar frico.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.desc: Chef Spencer Watts prepares quick, easy, and delicious dishes like Skillet Lasagna, Creamed Spinach, and Banana Ice Cream in under 30 minutes.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.desc: 30-minute meals have never tasted this good! Chef Spencer Watts offers up some secrets for the perfect fish and chips dinner.

programme.title: One BIG Recipe
programme.desc: What sets this cool One Big Recipe by charismatic chef-host Kimberly Lallouz apart? Folks, may I introduce the 'Wow Factor'? It's that hard- to-define special something, but we know it when we see it! Ogle her Chilled Mussels over Grilled Baguette lightly drizzled with vibrant, golden Saffron Aioli. Gasp at the golden gorgeous Roasted Mini Butternuts, ever so very vivacious with their Salsa Verde, tart Goat Cheese, and nutty toasted sunflower seed garnishes. Bone-in Veal Roast with an easy-to-execute and guaranteed-to-wow presentation is the apex of the event, with grainy mustard vinaigrette-dressed Charred Bok Choy halves. Dessert gets a moment in the spotlight, summer berries draped...

programme.title: Bring On The Karbs
programme.desc: Chefs Erica and Josh Karbelnik flash back to the 1990s and 1960s to see who can come up with the best retro menu! Josh makes ravioli in a can, stuffed crust, and dunking cookies, while Erica channels Julia Child with coq au vin and duck a l’orange!

programme.title: Global Street Eats
programme.desc: Chef Dev shows off Caribbean street foods he grew up eating. including Pepper Shrimp from Jamaica. Saltfish and Bake from Guyana. and Doubles from Trinidad and Tobago.

programme.title: Global Street Eats
programme.desc: Chef Dev loves spicy food. so he’s making some of his favorite street food recipes that use chilis. including Hawawshi sandwiches from Egypt. Chicken 65 from India. and Street Corn from Mexico.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.desc: If you have 30 minutes, then you have time to make Chinese take-out dinner for four people! Chef Spencer Watts cooks up a feast that costs $30.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.desc: Who doesn't love pizza night? Host Spencer Watts whips up a Quick and Easy Duo Pizza with a fresh Tomato Basil Salad.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini uses the fresh ingredients from rich Tuscan soil to make regional dishes like Spinach Ricotta Gnudi.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Celebrity Chef Michael Bonacini explores classic dishes from the central Italian region, Le Marche.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: The secluded region of Abruzzo makes for unique Italian cuisine. Chef Michael Bonacini shows us diverse regional recipes like Rolled Meat Crepes.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Pasta, bread, pizza dough! Host Michael Bonacini makes Apulian classics like Artichoke Cheese Panzerotti.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini explores the diversity of the Italian region Calabria by making fresh tuna to hearty pork to a sumptuous orange cake.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: The Italian region Campania is known for its seafood and pizza. Famed Chef Michael Bonacini prepares classics like Margherita Pizza and Fried Seafood.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Rice Balls Stuffed with Seafood and Pistachio Cannoli are on the menu as Chef Michael Bonacini explores dishes from the Italian island of Sicily.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Piemonte cuisine is influenced by its mountainous terrain. Chef Michael Bonacini shows us how to make its warm regional dishes like Bagna Cauda.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Celebrity Chef Michael Bonacini prepares traditional dishes from the Northern Italian region, Lombardy.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Home to popular Italian dishes like Tiramisu, Chef Michael Bonacini explores cuisine from Italy's Veneto region.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini cooks up classic dishes like Mint Fava Bean Soup and Amaretti Cake from the well-known Lazio region of Italy.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Charming host Michael Bonacini inspires us to make simple, flavourful dishes from the rustic Italian region, Umbria.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Famed Chef Michael Bonacini celebrates the food of the Italian Riviera as he shows viewers delicious dishes from Liguria.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Emilia Romagna is the culinary heart of Italy and Chef Michael Bonacini shows viewers how to make some of the region's most delicious dishes.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Renowned Chef Michael Bonacini takes viewers on a culinary tour of the Italian region of Trentino-Alto Adige without leaving his own kitchen.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Charming host Chef Michael Bonacini explores the mountainous region of Basilicata with a feast fit for any celebration. Beginning with an antipasto that caters to the region's southern heat, Michael stuffs crunchy sweet peppers with ripe tomatoes, savoury anchovies, and fresh oregano. Moving on to the primo, Michael cooks up a creamy Vermicelli Frittata. Using leftover pasta, he combines eggs with cheese, anchovies, and chili flakes for extra flavour to make a classic Basilicata dish. Michael cooks up Pollo Alla Potentina, a traditional meal from the Feast of Saint Gerard. This hearty chicken stew is sure to heat up your core, using hot peppers as the base of the meal. For his final dish,...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini highlights the tiny region of Molise, exposing some of its best kept savoury secrets. Starting with a classic, Michael cooks up a delicious multi-layered Chicory Timbale, a pie filled with fresh chicory, ripe roma tomatoes, and sliced prosciutto. To crisp up the top of the pie, Michael tops his delicious dish with finely grated pecorino cheese and crunchy breadcrumbs. Next up, Michael's primo is a spicy Octopus in Purgatory. This tender, colourful, and sumptuous dish is sure to impress in both looks and taste! For his secondo, Michael cooks up a traditional Marinated Rabbit. Stewed in wine, tomatoes, and chilies, this rustic dish will have your guests asking for...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Delving into the cold mountainous region of Valle D'Aosta, Celebrity chef Michael Bonacini whips up a meal of four hearty dishes that are sure to warm up any chilly day. First up is Michael's antipasto of Wild Mushrooms and Lardo on Rye. Coated with rich, earthy mushrooms, buttery fontina cheese, and savoury cured pork, this decadent dish highlights a combination of iconic flavours from Valle D'Aosta. Next up is a twist on traditional pasta with Valle D'Aosta's unique Chestnut Fettucine topped with Sweet Pork and Earthy Cabbage. The secret to this dish? Chestnut flour to create a denser, sweeter, and nuttier pasta. For his secondo, Michael turns to the pride of the region, Fontina cheese,...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: The popular region of Tuscany is known for its wines, cheeses, and gorgeous sights. Chef Michael Bonacini introduces us to Tuscany's fine cuisine with four of his favourite dishes. Michael draws attention to the importance of mushrooms in Tuscan culture with an antipasto: Many Mushroom soup. Warm, hearty, and full of earthy flavour, Michael tops this soup with fried sage leaves to combine comfort and crunch in a single bite. For his primo, Michael explores a Tuscan favourite - Lamb Ragu! Served over pici noodles, Michael's rich ragu is complemented by fresh, light herbs. Then, Michael serves up a Porchetta-Style Duck, a crispy and tender secondo. To bring his meal together, Michael ends...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: From hearty inland crops to fresh food of the sea, the Venetian region covers it all. Host Michael Bonacini begins with the sea as he serves up an antipasto of succulent Soft Shell Crab. Michael pairs the crab with a Tangy Aioli made from sundried tomatoes, creating the perfect combination of crispy and creamy. Moving inland for his primo, Michael twists together two classic Venetian dishes to make a new favourite: Radicchio Risotto! With his secondo, Michael cooks up a light and creamy Pancetta-Wrapper Snapper with Pea Mash. Sweet and tender, this dish will melt in your mouth. Whether you're in the mood to share or feeling a little selfish, Michael's Giant Almond Crumb Biscuit covers it...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Puglia's lush landscape and large coastline characterize its cuisine. Chef Michael Bonacini explores its native ingredients through some of Puglia's favourite meals. First up, Michael's antipasto is a guaranteed crunchy bite with crispy Fried Mussels. Stepping away from the sea, Michael highlights Puglia's prize crop: tomatoes! Combining colourful tomatoes with flavourful burrata cheese, Michael cooks up comfort in a bowl with his Tomato and Burrata Risotto. Taking on a more festive flair, Michael introduces us to Little Pork Bombs, the hottest street food in Puglia. With a filling of fresh herbs and melted cheese, these pork skewers are savoury and irresistible. Then, Michael introduces...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Simplicity is key with Sicilian cuisine and Chef Michael Bonacini explores just how the region balances simplicity with intensity through four flavourful dishes. Starting with an antipasto of Folded Flatbread with Ricotta and Fennel Seeds, Michael inspires with its intricate beauty with a simple recipe. Keeping to the theme of simplicity, Michael shows that plenty of flavour can come from little ingredients in his primo of Broccoli and Sausage Rigatoni. The spicy sausage and chili is countered by a creamy broccoli pesto for a dish that highlights Sicilian cuisine. Michael turns to the Italian queen of crops for his secondo: Eggplant Parmesan Roll-Ups. With thin slices of eggplant rolled...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Filled with ruins in its bustling streets, the region of Lazio sticks with grandeur in all it does, including food! To introduce us to Lazio, Host Michael Bonacini highlights its Jewish influence with a crispy Roman Jewish-style Artichokes. As crunchy as a potato chip, Michael's artichokes are a delicious fried treat that are a perfect way to kick off a delicious meal. For his primo Michael brings together simple ingredients to create a rich Bucatini with Amatriciana Sauce. Michael's secondo turns what was once peasant food into a delectable and tender dish. Cooked with a blend of vegetables and sauce, Michael's Braised Oxtail brings forth the history of cuisine. Returning to Rome for his...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Campania's beautiful coastline is filled with two things: tourists and seafood. Diving into the culture of the region, Celebrity Chef Michael Bonacini begins his meal with a salad from the Island of Capri. Putting a twist on the classic dish, Michael's Grilled Caprese Salad combines fresh tomatoes, tangy balsamic, and a hint of sweetness from basil. For his primo, Michael serves up bold flavours with his Spaghetti Puttanesca. Mixing salty and sweet, this sauce offers a delicious take on the typical plate of spaghetti. Looking to the coast for his secondo, Michael quickly cooks up aromatic and spicy Herb-stuffed Scallops and Grilled Broccoli Rabe. For his dolce Michael whips up a dessert...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini delves into the Italian region of Emilia- Romagna to discover its iconic cuisine. To start, Michael stays light with an airy Mortadella Mousse spread on fluffy Modena Mini Flatbreads. Next, Michael cooks up Tortellini in Broth, a dish originally from Bologna that can be easily altered to personal taste. Michael chooses to fill his tortellini with a rich and savoury mixture of prosciutto, mortadella, and ground pork. For his secondo, Michael uses traditional ingredients and pairs them in a tart, luxurious dish of Duck Breast with Balsamic Cherry Sauce. To wind down his meal, Michael whips up a creamy classic, Rice Custard Cake topped with a Cherry Glaze.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini explores sweet and spicy dishes hailing from the coastal region of Calabria. For his antipasto, Michael cooks up a light and refreshing Brioche with Gelato. Fluffy brioche buns surround the sweet flavours of gelato for a delicious start to your meal. Switching to spice for the primo, Michael introduces a Spicy Sausage and Ricotta Pasta. Full of sweet, savoury, and spicy flavours, this dish provides a strong, flavourful meal sure to please any crowd. For his secondo, Michael goes for a hearty Lamb au Gratin with Peas and Asparagus; a classic holiday dish that will warm any room. For his finale, Michael whips up a simple, yet impressive, Chocolate-covered Figs.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Full of luxurious treats, the northern Italian region of Lombardy offers rich and delicious cuisine. For his antipasto, celebrity chef Michael Bonacini prepares a delicate dish of Stuffed Squash Blossoms. Soft and light, these blossoms are enhanced with a creamy filling of parmesan, anchovies, and nutmeg. Following the fresh taste of flowers, Michael cooks up an impressive and rich Risotto Milanese. A feast for your eyes and taste buds, this risotto is coloured by saffron and its floral strands release flavour and colour as it's cooked. For his secondo Michael pairs a succulent Veal Roast with the sweet and sour Mustard Fruit to bring out a tangy delight. Michael's dolce looks solely at...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Known for its lush landscape, Umbria is a region of that offers fresh, seasonal ingredients perfect for simple yet boldly flavoured cuisine. To begin his Umbrian feast, Chef Michael Bonacini serves up a sweet and spicy antipasto of Fried Spicy Tomato Flatbread. Seasoned with chili peppers for that bit of heat, Michael's antipasto is a humble yet satisfying snack. For his primo, Michael brings our attention to an Umbrian specialty: truffles! Prepared with light and fluffy pasta, Michael's Gnocchi with Black Truffle concentrates the decadent flavour of the truffle in the pillowy pasta to create a rich and delectable dish. Paying homage to the plights of farmers and fisherman, Michael's...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Appreciating island culture, host Michael Bonacini explores the enchanting region of Sardegna and its exceptional cuisine. Michael begins his island feast with a taste of the sea through his seasoned antipasto of Stuffed Snails. Next, Michael prepares a luxurious and delicate Lobster Spaghetti, highlighting the fresh seafood of the region. Moving inland for his secondo, Michael cooks up a traditional dish of Lamb with Artichokes and Saffron, a meal that combines three of Sardegna's most famous ingredients. To end his meal, Michael combines salty and sweet with a dolce of Honey and Cheese Fritters.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: One of Italy's quieter regions, Friuli Venezia Guilia offers iconic decadent dishes, waiting to be discovered. Renowned chef Michael Bonacini begins his exploration of the region with his take on a traditional meal: Cheese Crisp Baskets with Polenta and Mushrooms. This savoury antipasto is an elegant looking dish with humble flavours. For his primo, Michael prepares a unique Poppy Seed, Sage, and Prosciutto Pasta, a dish that is a twist on traditional pasta. Looking for a little heat in his secondo, Michael cooks up a meal of Spicy Tomato Scampi. The sweet meat of the scampi counters the heat of the sauce, creating a delicious flavour combination. To end his meal, Michael looks to the...
